name: 约瑟夫·冯·夫琅禾费
bio_short: 德国光学家和物理学家。他是一位顶尖的透镜制造商，发明了“光谱仪”，并系统性地绘制了太阳光谱中的“夫琅禾费（吸收）谱线”，为光谱学的诞生奠定了基础。
bio_short_en: A German optician and physicist. He was a master lens maker who invented the 'spectroscope' and systematically mapped the 'Fraunhofer (absorption) lines' in the solar spectrum, laying the foundation for spectroscopy.
